provided_description: 1 Y indicates that the contribution is itemized
1 Y indicates that the contribution has associated travel
30 Type of contributor name data - INDIVIDUAL or ENTITY
100 For ENTITY, the contributor organization name
100 For INDIVIDUAL, the contributor last name
30 For INDIVIDUAL, the contributor name suffix (e.g. JR, MD, II)
45 For INDIVIDUAL, the contributor first name
30 For INDIVIDUAL, the contributor name prefix (e.g. MR, MRS, MS)
25 For INDIVIDUAL, the contributor short name (nickname)
2 Contributor street address - state code (e.g. TX, CA) - for
3 Contributor street address - country (e.g. USA, UMI, MEX, CAN)
20 Contributor street address - postal code - for USA addresses only
30 Contributor street address - region for country other than USA
12 FEC ID of out-of-state PAC contributor
1 Indicates if contributor is an out-of-state PAC
